languages.text: {n}Вы замахиваетесь ножом... и внезапно юнец, оскалившись, бьет вас в ответ — слишком быстро, чтобы вы могли отреагировать. Боль приводит вас в чувство — вы приходите в себя на краю обрыва, с глубокой раной в теле и в окружении обеспокоенных спутников, один из которых — Маражай — со зверским видом держит наизготовку окровавленный друкарский кинжал.{/n}

{n}You raise the knife up high... when the youth suddenly bares his teeth and strikes you first, too quickly for you to react in time. The pain causes your consciousness to come rushing back. You find yourself standing at the edge of the bottomless pit, with a bleeding stab wound on your body, surrounded by your worried companions, one of whom, Marazhai, is staring at you ferociously, clutching a bloodied Drukhari dagger.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы замахиваетесь ножом... и внезапно юнец, оскалившись, бьет вас в ответ — слишком быстро, чтобы вы могли отреагировать. Боль приводит вас в чувство — вы приходите в себя на краю обрыва, с глубокой раной в теле и в окружении обеспокоенных спутников, один из которых — Маражай — со зверским видом держит наизготовку окровавленный друкарский кинжал.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You raise the knife up high... when the youth suddenly bares his fangs and strikes you first, too quickly for you to react in time. The pain causes your consciousness to come rushing back. You find yourself standing at the edge of the bottomless pit, with a bleeding stab wound on your body, surrounded by your worried companions, one of whom, Marazhai, is staring at you ferociously, clutching a bloodied Drukhari dagger.{/n}
traits.speaker: Бездонный провал

languages.text: {n}你高高地举起了刀……随后年轻人突然露出了尖牙，抢先向你袭来。他的速度太快，你根本无法反应过来。由于疼痛，你马上恢复了神志。你发现自己正站在无底深渊边缘，身上有一处流血的刀伤。你的同伴围在你身边，看起来忧心忡忡。玛拉斋也在其中，他正恶狠狠地盯着你，手里的黑暗灵族匕首正滴着血。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You raise the knife up high... when the youth suddenly bares his teeth and strikes you first, too quickly for you to react in time. The pain causes your consciousness to come rushing back. You find yourself standing at the edge of the bottomless pit, with a bleeding stab wound on your body, surrounded by your worried companions, one of whom, Marazhai, is staring at you ferociously, clutching a bloodied Drukhari dagger.{/n}

traits.speaker: Бездонный провал

languages.text: {n}あなたはナイフを高く振り上げる…若者が歯を剥き出してあなたに襲いかかってくる。あまりの素早さにあなたの反応は間に合わなかった。痛みで意識が戻って来る。あなたは自分が心配そうな仲間に囲まれ、底なしのピットの縁に立っていることに気づく。身体には刺し傷があり、血が流れている。仲間の一人、マラズハイが血まみれのデュカーリの短剣を掴んだまま、凶暴な目であなたを見ている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You raise the knife up high... when the youth suddenly bares his teeth and strikes you first, too quickly for you to react in time. The pain causes your consciousness to come rushing back. You find yourself standing at the edge of the bottomless pit, with a bleeding stab wound on your body, surrounded by your worried companions, one of whom, Marazhai, is staring at you ferociously, clutching a bloodied Drukhari dagger.{/n}

traits.speaker: Бездонный провал

languages.text: {n}Vous brandissez le couteau... quand soudain, le jeune montre les dents et vous frappe en premier, trop rapide pour vous laisser le temps de réagir. La douleur provoque le réveil de votre conscience. Vous vous tenez au bord de la fosse sans fond, arborant une plaie béante, {mf|entouré|entourée} de vos compagnons inquiets, dont un, Marazhai, qui vous fixe d'un air féroce, en serrant une dague drukhari ensanglantée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You raise the knife up high... when the youth suddenly bares his teeth and strikes you first, too quickly for you to react in time. The pain causes your consciousness to come rushing back. You find yourself standing at the edge of the bottomless pit, with a bleeding stab wound on your body, surrounded by your worried companions, one of whom, Marazhai, is staring at you ferociously, clutching a bloodied Drukhari dagger.{/n}

La douleur provoque le réveil de votre conscience. Vous vous tenez au bord de la fosse sans fond, arborant une plaie béante, {mf|entouré|entourée} de vos compagnons inquiets, dont un, Marazhai, qui vous fixe d'un air féroce, en serrant une dague drukhari ensanglantée.{/n}
traits.speaker: Бездонный провал

languages.text: {n}Alzas el cuchillo... y de repente el joven consigue atacarte primero, demasiado rápido para que puedas reaccionar. El dolor hace que recuperes el conocimiento al instante. Te encuentras de pie al borde de un abismo, con una herida de puñal de la que brota sangre en tu cuerpo, rodead{mf|o|a} por tus preocupados compañeros, de los cuales, Marazhai te mira con fiereza sujetando una sangrienta daga Drukhari.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You raise the knife up high... when the youth suddenly bares his teeth and strikes you first, too quickly for you to react in time. The pain causes your consciousness to come rushing back. You find yourself standing at the edge of the bottomless pit, with a bleeding stab wound on your body, surrounded by your worried companions, one of whom, Marazhai, is staring at you ferociously, clutching a bloodied Drukhari dagger.{/n}

Te encuentras de pie al borde de un abismo, con una herida de puñal de la que brota sangre en tu cuerpo, rodead{mf|o|a} por tus preocupados compañeros, de los cuales, Marazhai te mira con fiereza sujetando una sangrienta daga Drukhari.{/n}
traits.speaker: Бездонный провал

languages.text: {n}Du hebst dein Messer ... als der Jüngling plötzlich die Zähne fletscht und dich zuerst angreift, zu schnell, um rechtzeitig zu reagieren. Der Schmerz führt dazu, dass dein Bewusstsein sofort zurückkehrt. Du stehst mit einer blutenden Stichwunde am Rand des bodenlosen Lochs, deine Gefährten umringen dich besorgt, und einer davon, Marazhai, starrt dich wild an, in der Hand einen blutigen Drukhari-Dolch.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You raise the knife up high... when the youth suddenly bares his teeth and strikes you first, too quickly for you to react in time. The pain causes your consciousness to come rushing back. You find yourself standing at the edge of the bottomless pit, with a bleeding stab wound on your body, surrounded by your worried companions, one of whom, Marazhai, is staring at you ferociously, clutching a bloodied Drukhari dagger.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bıçağı havaya kaldırıyorsun... Ancak delikanlı, aniden dişlerini sıkıyor ve senden önce davranarak tepki veremeyeceğin bir hızla saldırıyor. Çektiğin acı sayesinde bilincine yeniden kavuşuyorsun. Kendini dipsiz çukurun kenarında, vücudunda kanayan bir bıçak yarasıyla buluyorsun. Endişeli yoldaşların, etrafını sarmış vaziyette. İçlerinden Marazhai, elindeki kanlı Drukhari hançerini sıkıca tutmuş, vahşice ve dik dik sana bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You raise the knife up high... when the youth suddenly bares his teeth and strikes you first, too quickly for you to react in time. The pain causes your consciousness to come rushing back. You find yourself standing at the edge of the bottomless pit, with a bleeding stab wound on your body, surrounded by your worried companions, one of whom, Marazhai, is staring at you ferociously, clutching a bloodied Drukhari dagger.{/n}
